name: webwhispr
description: Privacy-respecting voice input for any text field in your browser. Transcribes speech using Whisper AI running entirely in your browser.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run build:offscreen && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:offscreen: mkdir -p dist/offscreen && esbuild src/offscreen/offscreen.js --bundle --outfile=dist/offscreen/offscreen.js --platform=browser && cp src/offscreen/offscreen.html dist/offscreen/
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r src/popup dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Load dist/ folder as unpacked extension in Chrome'
